block lp < 20
	 EndWindow "\n\n\n\n@c你的生命值不足20"

block
	KillItem 69117,1
	setlp -20
	Play_SE 210,320,240
	Play_SE 218,320,240
	giveLeak1Item (71034%20$1,71037%20$1,71040%20$1,71043%20$1,71046%10$1,71033%10$1,71036%10$1,71039%10$1,71042%10$1,71045%10$1,71032%1$1,71035%1$1,71038%1$1,71041%1$1,71044%1$1)
endblock
